channel.title: The Liminal by Fox and Thistle Studio
channel.description: A monthly creative almanac weaving art, poetry, sustainability, and seasonal reflections.

item.title: The Liminal - Harvest Moon Cycle - September 2025
item.description: Ripe apples, late pears, persimmons, and more. A creative almanac with poetry, recipes, and reflections on the Harvest Moon cycle, dropping with each New Moon.

item.title: The Liminal - Hunter Moon Cycle - October 2025
item.description: Under October’s Hunter Moon, The Liminal unfurls autumn’s quiet mysteries: a 2026 Fortnight Calendar, Seasonal poems from Alix Klingenberg, Scottish Loom Work, Maritime Arches, 16th-century Absurdism, Lost Friends, and a Four-Toed Feetloaf Recipe. Explore Twilight at Fox & Thistle Studio.
